detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in soft viscose jersey with decorative buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and elastication at the top and cuffs.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long hole-patterned sleeves and no buttons.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Fitted body in soft, ribbed jersey. Straight cut and a double layer at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Playsuit in woven fabric with decorative lace trims, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated waist. Smocking at the back, side pockets and short legs. Lined at the top.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder jersey top with wide elastication and a flounce at the top.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a woven, printed chest pocket, dropped shoulders and concealed press-studs on one shoulder. Woven yoke at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in airy cotton twill with a ribbed, elasticated waistband with a decorative drawstring. Patch front pockets, back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Hooded, oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered hood with a wrapover front. Short, frayed, cut-off sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hem.
Longer-style, slub-knit cotton jumper with a round neckline, asymmetric seam at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.
Calf-length, pleated dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Metal watch. Diameter of face 3.5 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 17 cm.
Straight-style top in an airy, fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a lightly crinkled weave. Small, frilled, smocked collar with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a tab and button on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and gently rounded hem.
Knee-length skirt in an airy weave with beaded embroidery, a high waist, concealed zip at the back and slit at the hem. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Ankle boots in soft leather with pointed toes and a zip at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Kitten heels 5.5 cm.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed hem and an appliqué on the front.

Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Height approx. 18 cm. Width approx. 26 cm.
Suede loafers with decorative studs, open sides and a small, concealed wedge heel. Suede linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Shaftless yoga socks in a fine knit with anti-slip protectors.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard.

City shorts in a stretch cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Waist with an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, covered elastication at the cuffs and hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Lined. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Flared, calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with long ties at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves and wide tiers to the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in viscose crêpe with a round neckline and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
V-neck jumper in a soft double knit containing some mohair with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides and hem.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded appliqués at the top, a turtle neck and low dropped shoulders.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Fully lined sports bralette in ribbed microfibre with wide ribbing at the hem and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Short dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with gathers. Beaded embroidery around the neckline and waist and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high paper bag waist. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist, a fastening with two buttons at the front and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.

Waist-high briefs in supersoft, stretch jersey that moulds to the body – one size fits all. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. Lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Ankle-length trousers in a recycled polyester jacquard weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fitted at the top with back pockets and straight legs with gently flared hems.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets, and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Short, fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from recycled polyester. Round neckline with a narrow trim.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and covered elastication at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Cropped, fitted blouse in a woven cotton blend with shaping seams at the front and wide smocking at the back. Sweetheart neckline, long puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders, and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
